name: Psycho Dreams
storyline:
On January 1, 1995, having made a deal with an unknown creature, you were entrusted with the mission to save humanity from suffering, but maybe its all a dream?
. . . A psycho dream?
summary: Psycho Dreams is a surreal psychological horror game inspired by Yume Nikki, with deep atmosphere, interesting mysteries and exciting story inspired by the best visual novel games!
